celebrations.eventDescription: I feel immensely privileged to be given the opportunity to curate a one-day design research conference for Clearleft. Stay tuned for announcements about a special event in February 2025 in Brighton.
Celebrating my time at Clearleft working with the smartest people on the most interesting projects. Thanks for having me!
celebrations.imageDescription: A white card with the word ‘thank you’ hand-written in Japanese hiragana characters stood on a wooden table.
celebrations.moreText: Read about my experience at Clearleft
